about_the_game:
Wanna "Bring me a man, Santa" concepts in HD and its sketches in your pocket?

This pack contains "Bring me a man, Santa" concept arts and its sketches. Check the whole development process before the final version! Also, you can use the concepts to make your wallpapers and/or have fun without having to access the game. In other words, you'll get:


  • 7 Clothed Characters in HD resolution;
  • 7 Naked Characters in HD resolution;
  • 20 sketches;

To access it, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Bring me a man, Santa\Adult Art Pack
